survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Home Appliance Repair Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have recently used home appliance repair services to evaluate their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the repair service provided?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the options are displayed in a single-column format for clarity.
